version_description:
Hot on the heels of our last release, the feature that everybody has been clamoring for is here: Check-In to trakt.tv! A few minor upgrades have been snuck in as well. Enjoy!

@getseenitapp
getseenitapp@gmail.com

- Fix issue with occasionally being logged out between app launches
- Add ability to Filter/Sort Watched shows

- iOS 10 fixes
- Updated to new trakt.tv API guidelines

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- Minor fixes and improvements.
- Fix Today Widget for iOS 10.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

- Minor fixes and improvements.
- Fix Today Widget for iOS 10.
